emailOtp.header: Enter one-time passcode to create account
emailOtp.body_text1: We just sent a one-time passcode to
emailOtp.body_text2: . The one-time passcode expires shortly, so please enter it soon.

emailLinkSent.header: Check your inbox to create your account
emailLinkSent.body_text1: We just sent you a magic link to
emailLinkSent.body_text2: . Click on the link in the email to finish setting up your account.

body_text2.emailOtp: passkey or via email one-time passcode
body_text2.emailLink: passkey or via email magic link

passkeyBenefits.body_introduction: With passkeys, you don't need to remember complex passwords anymore. Log in securely by using

emailLinkSent.body_text2: . Click on the link in the email to login to your account.

body.emailOtp: Log in with passkeys not possible. Try again or log in with email one-time passcode.
body.emailLink: Log in with passkeys not possible. Try again or log in with email magic link.

unexpectedError.body_noCustomerSupport: Please try again in a few moments.

errors.userAlreadyExists: Email address is already in use. If this account is yours, please log in instead.
errors.passkeyAlreadyExists: Passkey for this device already exists
errors.invalidPasskey: The provided passkey is no longer valid. Log in using your email address instead.
errors.invalidOtp: The provided one-time passcode is not valid
errors.invalidToken: The provided token is not valid for user verification
errors.noConditionalUiSupport: Conditional UI is not supported by your device
errors.conditionalUiUnconfirmedCredential: This passkey can not be used yet. Please confirm your identify first by logging in with your email address.
errors.unknownError: Something went wrong. Please try again later

dialog_passkeyAlreadyExists.body: A passkey for this device already exists. If you are facing issues with your passkey, please delete it and create a new one.
